text: Scheduled Assessments Exam Periods 2024W2 - Vancouver Students: We are currently experiencing exam display issues on this page. We are working to resolve this. In, the meantime, please view your scheduled exams at https://students.ubc.ca/exam-schedule Please note: Exam days, times and locations can change. Make sure you check your exam schedule frequently for changes. Exam date, location and time columns can also be sorted by clicking on the column header.
